## Feature Description

A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem Statement

What problem does this feature solve? Is your feature request related to a problem?

Example: "I'm always frustrated when [...]"

## Proposed Solution

A clear and concise description of what you want to happen.

## Alternative Solutions

Have you considered any alternative solutions or workarounds? Please describe them here.

## Use Case

Describe a specific scenario where this feature would be valuable:

1. As a [type of user]
2. I want to [do something]
3. So that [achieve some goal]

## Implementation Ideas

If you have thoughts on how this could be implemented, share them here:

- Technical approach
- What files/modules would need to change
- Any potential challenges

## Additional Context

Add any other context, mockups, or screenshots about the feature request here.

## Impact

How would this feature benefit users?

- [ ] Improves existing workflow
- [ ] Adds new capability
- [ ] Enhances performance
- [ ] Improves UX/UI
- [ ] Other: [please specify]

## Checklist

- [ ] I have searched existing issues/PRs for similar feature requests
- [ ] This feature aligns with the project's scope and goals
- [ ] I am willing to help implement this feature (optional)
- [ ] I have considered backward compatibility
